name: Japel Johnson
text: I order here often, but what took me by surprise was the young lady who greeted me as soon as I walked in by my name. This is the first time that has ever happened. She was very polite and nice and definitely showed proper customer service. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rob Haselden
text: Ordered a pizza for carry out. Got it back to the hotel to find it had no sauce on it. Called and ended up speaking to a manager (Carolyn?) that offered to remake the pizza and have it delivered. Over an hour later, no pizza. Called back ‚Ä¶More

name: rodger Andrews
text: I get P. H. delivered regularly, I've only ordered surprimo sandwich and the jugs of sweet tea. So that's the only foods I can comment on and I love them. I always get delivery and so far haven't messed up anything.

name: Jewel Beston
text: Great selections in-store and for delivery. Great sport coverage as well as intercom music. Friendly service and clean place. Long waits for orders up the 3times I've been there even when ordering over the phone for pick up. Delivery was ‚Ä¶More

text: Food wasn't great for price but staff was understanding of our displeasure.  Probably won't go back but the waitress & manager were awesome & very thoughtful. Night manager Michelle deserves a raise!üòÅ

name: Melissa Warfield
text: The Pizza Hut in Glendive, Montana is super good. Our group ordered different items to share. Hot wings, pizza, pasta, you just about name it and Pizza Hut has it. I prefer this Pizza Hut over the one we have where we live. The taste ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelly Sanchez
text: Such amazing service! Our waiter Raymond was very understanding when we had to take off and catch our loose horses at the fairgrounds. We came back and had amazing food with the best service from him. I wish I could have left him a bigger tip! He definitely deserves a raise. Thank you!

name: Jake Wilder
text: The young lady that took my order took the time to come out and make sure the pizza was exactly how I ordered it. Kudos to her for taking pride in her job and care enough for the order to double check rather than assume üòä

name: CnoteC
text: Ordered a stuffed crust pizza, they said 20 minutes I come back inside in 20 minutes and the pizza is barely warm and is barely cooked. What took 20 minutes? Tastes like raw dough ,what a joke. 1 stuffed crust large pizza 20$ scumbags and rip off artists.

text: Best pizza hut ive ever been to. Customer servive was great, pizza was great, wait times were also great. 10/10

name: Alex Roelofs
text: Best service in town, hands down. Friendly staff, unbeatable table service, hot and fresh food every single day. Fantastic customer service is capable and happy to resolve any complaints. This is not fast food, this is a full-service restaurant and the best Pizza Hut I've ever been to.

text: Ordered one order of Cinnasticks online and it said it would be ready in 25-30 mins. Just ONE item and 50 mins later nothing is ready. They blamed it on being busy. If you need almost an hour to make one small item there are serious issues. ‚Ä¶More

text: The food and service has gotten much better . we had stopped eating here because it took forever to get your food. But the last 2 times we've eaten here the food came faster and the buffet was pretty good. And our waitress remembered we were there!
